mapper.select: SELECT * from dev_user WHERE devCode=#{devCode} AND devPassword=#{devPassword}

select T1.softwareName, T1.APKName, T1.softwareSize, T1.supportROM, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id=T1.categoryLevel1) AS categoryLevel1Name, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id=T1.categoryLevel2) AS categoryLevel2Name, (SELECT categoryName FROM app_category WHERE app_category.id=T1.categoryLevel3) AS categoryLevel3Name, (SELECT valueName FROM data_dictionary WHERE typeCode = 'APP_STATUS' AND valueId=T1.status) AS statusName, T1.downloads, (SELECT versionNo FROM app_version WHERE app_version.id=T1.versionId) AS versionNo from app_info AS T1
